articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: U19 WC final: Irfan Pathan bashes Pakistani fans with 'keyboard warriors' jibe - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Irfan Pathan has hit back at trolls after India were outplayed by Australia in the U-19 World Cup final on Sunday. | Cricket
articles.content: With Pakistani fans taking aim at the Indian cricket team following the conclusion of the ICC U-19 World Cup, former Indian cricketer Irfan Pathan issued a strong response for the 'keyboard warriors … [+1958 chars]
